title: Gaping Wounds
content:
Gaping Wounds Attacks against this creature deal an additional 2Piercing damage. Removed by healing.

Attacks against this creature deal an additional 2Piercing damage. Removed by healing.

Gaping Wounds is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Gaping Wounds Information

Attacks against this creature deal an additional 2 Piercing damage. Removed by healing.

How to Acquire Gaping Wounds
